title: Get Server Information
name: getAbout
description: Get information about the Right Track API Server and its supported agencies and transit agencies.

permission.name: public
permission.title: API-Access: public
permission.description: These API endpoints do not require an API client key.

title: Get All Agency Information
name: getAgencies
description: Get information about agencies supported by the Right Track API Server.

permission.name: public
permission.title: API-Access: public
permission.description: These API endpoints do not require an API client key.

permission.name: public
permission.title: API-Access: public
permission.description: These API endpoints do not require an API client key.

title: Get Agency Icon
name: getAgencyIcon
description: Get the icon for the specified agency.

permission.name: public
permission.title: API-Access: public
permission.description: These API endpoints do not require an API client key.

title: Get Agency Links
name: getAgencyLinks
description: Get the set of additional resource links for the specified agency.

permission.name: public
permission.title: API-Access: public
permission.description: These API endpoints do not require an API client key.

permission.name: debug
permission.title: API-Access: debug
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'debug' privileges. These endpoints can display sensitive information and need to be explicitly enabled.

title: Reload Server Config
name: getAdminReload
description: Reload the API Server and Agency configuration files as well as reload the agency databases and reconnect to the server's MySQL database.

permission.name: admin
permission.title: API-Access: admin
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'admin' privileges. These endpoints alter the state of the API server.

title: User Login
name: login
description: User login: create a new session and return the session information to the user.

permission.name: auth
permission.title: API-Access: auth
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'auth' privileges. These endpoints allow User's to login and logout of the client.

title: User Logout
name: login
description: User logout: If the session is valid for the User, remove it from the Server database, invalidating from any further uses.

permission.name: auth
permission.title: API-Access: auth
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'auth' privileges. These endpoints allow User's to login and logout of the client.

title: Get Route
name: getRoute
description: Get the specified GTFS Route for the specified agency.

permission.name: gtfs
permission.title: API-Access: gtfs
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'gtfs' privileges. These endpoints query the agencies' Right Track Databases and display the GTFS data classes.

title: Get Routes
name: getRoutes
description: Get the GTFS Routes for the specified agency.

permission.name: gtfs
permission.title: API-Access: gtfs
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'gtfs' privileges. These endpoints query the agencies' Right Track Databases and display the GTFS data classes.

title: Get Stop
name: getStop
description: Get the specified GTFS Stop for the specified agency.

permission.name: gtfs
permission.title: API-Access: gtfs
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'gtfs' privileges. These endpoints query the agencies' Right Track Databases and display the GTFS data classes.

title: Get Stops
name: getStops
description: Get the GTFS Stops for the specified agency. Optionally add the query param ?hasFeed=true to request just the stops with a valid Status ID (ie Stops that have a Station Feed).

permission.name: gtfs
permission.title: API-Access: gtfs
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'gtfs' privileges. These endpoints query the agencies' Right Track Databases and display the GTFS data classes.

Query Arguments.description: Request Stops with a valid Status ID

title: Get Trip
name: getTrip
description: Get the specified GTFS Trip for the specified agency.

permission.name: gtfs
permission.title: API-Access: gtfs
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'gtfs' privileges. These endpoints query the agencies' Right Track Databases and display the GTFS data classes.

title: Add User
name: addUser
description: Register a new user and add their information to the API database. This will first check to make sure the User's email, username, and password all meet the requirements set by the Server.

permission.name: registration
permission.title: API-Access: registration
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'registration' privileges. These endpoints allow the client to register new Users and remove existing Users.

title: Get User
name: getUser
description: Get the registration and session information for the specified User.

permission.name: auth
permission.title: API-Access: auth
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'auth' privileges. These endpoints allow User's to login and logout of the client.

title: Get Users
name: getUsers
description: Get the registration and session information for all registered Users. Optionally filter by email and/or username

permission.name: debug
permission.title: API-Access: debug
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'debug' privileges. These endpoints can display sensitive information and need to be explicitly enabled.

title: Registration Requirements
name: registrationRequirements
description: Get the User registration requirements for a new User's username and password.

permission.name: registration
permission.title: API-Access: registration
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'registration' privileges. These endpoints allow the client to register new Users and remove existing Users.

title: Remove User
name: removeUser
description: Remove the specified User from the Server database

permission.name: registration
permission.title: API-Access: registration
permission.description: These API endpoints require an API client key with 'registration' privileges. These endpoints allow the client to register new Users and remove existing Users.
